post:
Hi there

we are a new Hosting Solutions provider based in the UK and are currently offering the following VPS Plan for £2 for the first month until the end of july.

CPU Cores 7vCPU's Fair Share

Diskspace 20GB

Bandwidth 500GB

Memory 384MB

Memory Burst / Swap 384MB

IPV4 Addresses 1

IPV6 Addresses 0

Control Panel SolusVM

Platform OpenVZ

Locations France / Canada

Uplink Speed 100MBPS

Deployment Time 10 Minutes

Management Unmanaged

Plans Available 5

Setup Fee Free

Price Per Month £4.00 GBP / $5.98 USD 

The promotional price will be applied during checkout.

Please be aware we manually process orders at this time as we are working on a new basic site design and work on it constantly so some parts may be not accessible at the moment but orders can be placed and support is available.

More plans will follow as we setup but for now we wanted to present something that may fit users needs.

VPS Page: [http://home.cl-solutions.net/solutions_vpsservers.php](http://home.cl-solutions.net/solutions_vpsservers.php)

Thank you.

Chris.
